mapper.insert: insert into editorCode_tb (id, editor_name, editor_startPage, editor_code, editor_path) values (#{id}, #{editorName}, #{startPage}, #{code}, #{path})
mapper.select: select id id, editor_name editorName, editor_startPage startPage, editor_code code, editor_path path from editorCode_tb where editor_name=#{editorName} and ROWNUM = 1
select id id, editor_name editorName, editor_startPage startPage, editor_code code, editor_path path from editorCode_tb
